animeDescription: Captain Herlock is drawn into a saga of intergalactic proportions when the son of a deceased comrade unwittingly forges the Ring of the Niebelung. Evil forces gather to wage war against the last remaining superpowers of the galaxy led by a demented outcast. Herlock must counter the amassed armadas that threaten the last gods and recover the ring before Paradise is lost. (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Nibelung no Yubiwa', 'Prequel: Uchuu Kaizoku Captain Herlock', 'Sequel: Maetel Legend']
